<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A helper class to manage the placement of various structures into the final</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// minidump binary. Space for objects can be allocated via various allocate&#42;&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// methods, while the final minidump file is written by calling the writeTo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// method. The plain versions of allocation functions take a reference to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// data which is to be written (and hence the data must be available until</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// writeTo is called), while the &quot;New&quot; versions allocate the data in an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// allocator-managed buffer, which is available until the allocator object is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// destroyed. For both kinds of functions, it is possible to modify the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// data for which the space has been &quot;allocated&quot; until the final writeTo call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is useful for &quot;linking&quot; the allocated structures via their offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-minidumpemitter-cpp-/bloballocator"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-minidumpemitter-cpp-/bloballocator">BlobAllocator</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
